heading: The gateway to the Naitec family.
subheading: High efficiency, heating capability down to -25°C, and integrated Wi-Fi for convenient control from your smartphone. Smart ensures clean, pleasant air and maximum comfort all year round.
why_info_item_1_description: It won't let you down even on the coldest days, this powerful system ensures comfort and warmth in every season. Effective heating with minimal energy costs.
why_info_item_2_description: The UVC lamp eliminates bacteria and viruses, while the ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. The combination of these innovations creates a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_3_description: Wi-Fi control allows you to easily adjust the temperature, modes, and other functions via your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, at any time.
why_info_item_4_description: With a noise level of just 22 dB in the quietest mode, we guarantee extremely quiet operation that is almost imperceptible. This low noise level ensures a peaceful environment, ideal for bedrooms, workspaces, and other quiet areas where peace and comfort are important.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of the R32 refrigerant ensures more effective cooling and heating while reducing environmental impact. It is the ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: This technology automatically cleans the indoor evaporator, enhancing air quality and ensuring a healthier environment.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the 'sterilization' function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57 °C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures the purification of the indoor unit and the elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology provides your home with a refreshing atmosphere and a healthy environment without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to effectively heat down to -25 °C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We prioritize quality, which is why we offer a 3-year warranty to ensure long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only if regular maintenance is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Purchase the Lisa voice controller for simple and convenient control of your air conditioner using voice commands.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set the desired performance limit of the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% of energy.
